sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_cabc2c15db79c410efd54a92ba9619b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_pisn_sp_bookmark.BookmarkRecordAPI</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>BookmarkRecordAPI</name><script><![CDATA[var BookmarkRecordAPI = Class.create();
BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME = 'x_pisn_sp_bookmark_bookmark_record';

BookmarkRecordAPI.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'BookmarkRecordAPI',

    getTable: function() {
        return BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME;
    },

    __getColumns: function(gr) {
        var record = {
            sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(),
            document_id: gr.getValue('document_id'),
            document_dv: gr.getDisplayValue('document_id'),
            document_desc: gr.getDisplayValue('document_id.short_description'),
            document_name: gr.getDisplayValue('document_id.name') || gr.getDisplayValue('document_id.short_description'),
            user: gr.getValue('user'),
            user_dv: gr.getDisplayValue('user'),
            created_doc: gr.getDisplayValue('document_id.sys_created_on'),
            created: gr.getValue('sys_created_on'),
            view_count: gr.getDisplayValue('document_id.sys_view_count'),
            table_name: gr.getDisplayValue('table_name'),
            page_sys_id: gr.getValue('page'),
            page_id: gr.getDisplayValue('page.id')
        };
        return record;
    },

    get: function(table, document_id, user) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME);
        gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.addActiveQuery();

        if (table)
            gr.addQuery('table_name', table);

        if (user)
            gr.addQuery('user', user);
        else
            gr.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID());

        if (document_id)
            gr.addQuery('document_id', document_id);

        gr.query();

        var sys_id_array = '';
        var i = 0;
        var data = {};
        data.records = [];
        while (gr.next()) {
            if (i == 0) {
                sys_id_array = gr.getValue('document_id');
            } else {
                sys_id_array = sys_id_array + ',' + gr.getValue('document_id');
            }
            i++;

            data.records.push(this.__getColumns(gr));
        }

        data.sys_ids = sys_id_array;
        return data;
    },

    add: function(sys_id, table_name, page, user, sys_bookmark) {
        var checkGr = new GlideRecord(BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME);
        checkGr.addQuery('document_id', sys_id);
        if (!user) {
            user = gs.getUserID();
        }
        checkGr.addQuery('user', user);
        checkGr.query();
        while (checkGr.next()) {
            return this.get(table_name);
        }

        var gr = new GlideRecord(BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME);
        gr.initialize();
        gr.table_name = table_name;
        gr.document_id = sys_id;
        gr.user = user;
        if (page) {
            gr.page = page;
        }
        gr.insert();

        if (sys_bookmark && table_name) {
            var grSysBookmark = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_bookmark');
            grSysBookmark.initialize();
            grSysBookmark.title = this.__getName(sys_id, table_name);
            grSysBookmark.url = '/' + table_name + '.do?sys_id=' + sys_id;
            grSysBookmark.user = user;
            grSysBookmark.pinned = true;
            grSysBookmark.icon = gs.getProperty('x_pisn_sp_bookmark.Icon');
            grSysBookmark.color = gs.getProperty('x_pisn_sp_bookmark.Color');
            grSysBookmark.insert();
        }

        return this.get(table_name);
    },


    remove: function(sys_id, table_name, sys_bookmark) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME);
        gr.addQuery('document_id', sys_id);
        gr.addQuery('user', gs.getUserID());

        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gr.deleteRecord();
        }

        if (sys_bookmark && table_name) {
            var grSysBookmark = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_bookmark');
            grSysBookmark.addQuery('urlLIKE' + table_name + '^urlLIKE' + sys_id + '^user=' + gs.getUserID());
            grSysBookmark.setLimit(1);
            grSysBookmark.query();
            if (grSysBookmark.next()) {
                grSysBookmark.deleteRecord();
            }
        }

        return this.get(table_name);
    },

    getMostSaved: function(table) {
        var count = new GlideAggregate(BookmarkRecordAPI.TABLE_NAME);
        count.addAggregate('COUNT', 'document_id');
        count.groupBy('document_id');
        if (table)
            count.addQuery('table_name', table);
        count.query();

        var sys_id_array = '';
        var i = 0;
        var data = {};
        data.records = [];
        var countDoc = 0;
        while (count.next()) {
            if (i == 0)
                sys_id_array = count.getValue('document_id');
            else
                sys_id_array = sys_id_array + ',' + count.getValue('document_id');

            i++;
            countDoc = count.getAggregate('COUNT', 'document_id');

            var record = this.__getColumns(count);
            record.count = countDoc;

            data.records.push(record);
        }

        data.sys_ids = sys_id_array;

        return data;
    },


    __getName: function(sys_id, table_name) {
        var name = '';
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table_name);
        if (gr.get(sys_id)) {
            name = gr.getDisplayValue(gr.getDisplayName());
        }
        return name;
    }
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fabio</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-17 11:24:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>cabc2c15db79c410efd54a92ba9619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BookmarkRecordAPI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SP Bookmark Record" source="x_pisn_sp_bookmark">4ef86049db718410efd54a92ba961914</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SP Bookmark Record">4ef86049db718410efd54a92ba961914</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cabc2c15db79c410efd54a92ba9619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fabio</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-19 11:40:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Add Bookmark Record</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var bookmarkRecordAPI = new x_pisn_sp_bookmark.BookmarkRecordAPI();
	
	var sys_id = request.body.data.sys_id;
	var table = request.body.data.table;
	var user = request.body.data.user;
	var page = request.body.data.page;
	var sys_bookmark = request.body.data.sys_bookmark == 'true' || request.body.data.sys_bookmark == true;
	
	var returnValue = bookmarkRecordAPI.add(sys_id,table,page,user,sys_bookmark);
	
	return returnValue;
